103 class BoxGeometry : public PhysicsGeometry {
104 public:
105  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
108  BoxGeometry(const Vector3f& extents);
109  BoxGeometry(float hx = 1.0, float hy = 1.0, float hz = 1.0);
110  ~BoxGeometry();
112 
113  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
116 
117  virtual const physx::PxGeometry& getGeometry() const override{
118  return m_box;
119  }
120 
121  float hx() const { return m_box.halfExtents.x; };
122  float hy() const { return m_box.halfExtents.y; };
123  float hz() const { return m_box.halfExtents.z; };
124 
125  void setHx(float x) { m_box.halfExtents.x = x; };
126  void setHy(float y) { m_box.halfExtents.y = y; };
127  void setHz(float z) { m_box.halfExtents.z = z; };
128 
129  Vector3d halfExtents() const;
130 
132  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
135 
137  inline bool isValid() const { return m_box.isValid(); }
138 
140 
141  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
144 
146  QJsonValue asJson(const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) const override;
147 
149  virtual void loadFromJson(const QJsonValue& json, const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) override;
